titleStmt.title: Proteus redivivus, or, The art of wheedling or insinuation obtain'd by general conversation and extracted from the several humours, inclinations, and passions of both sexes, respecting their several ages, and suiting each profession or occupation / collected and methodized by the author of the first part of the English rogue.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

notesStmt.note: "The author's epistle" signed: R.H. [i.e. Richard Head]. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
